title: Ocean challengers
creator_credit: David Perry, Brian Morris and Soundsense Film Productions
brief_description: Traces the epic voyage of the First fleet and contrasts it with the journey of group of adolescents who were prize-winners in an essay competition about the First Fleet. The students sailed from North Queensland to Sydney Harbour as crew members of a schooner.
creator_credit_for_label: David Perry, Brian Morris and Soundsense Film Productions
